reviewText: Thank you for a great product!!!! Just what i wanted and i highly recommend it to all. Keep up the great work.
I STARTED WATCHING VOLTRON WITH MY SISTER AND MYSELF WHEN WE WERE YOUNG. SO I STILL LIKE THIS CARTOON TODAY EVEN STILL.

These are the first 7 episodes of Voltron, telling the story of the 5 space explorers before they became the Voltron Force.  Pretty awesome.  I watched all 7 in one sitting because I couldn't wait to see them figure it all out

Grew up watching this, and I thought it would give me a less effect, but I was wrong. If you're a true fan of Voltron, start with this.

The item arrived on time, and in perfect condition.

For years, I've heard people go on about Voltron: Defender of the Universe but have never seen it. So, when I see Voltron: The Legend Begins on the shelf at my local Wal-Mart for real cheap, I decide to get it. Voltron: The Legend Begins basically gives you 7 full episodes that tells the origin story of a team of space explorers who search for the keys to five mythical robot lions on the planet Arus.  Arus has been ruined by the armies of King Zarkon and his use of giant Robeast monsters created by the witch Haggar.  Arus's only hope lies in the discovery of these five robot lions, which combine together to form Voltron.

If you hadn't seen Voltron, like me, this is a great place to start before collecting the whole series.

I loved it. It's a classic. It even features Michael Bell from Legacy of Kain fame.
My daughter loves Voltron. Used to watch this as a kid myself. Brings back memories :)

I watched Voltron when I was a kid and loved it. I am now turning our 3.5-year-old son onto it. He now loves Voltron. This is just a great DVD. My wife doesn't even mind watching. We have watched this DVD about 4 times already.
its pretty cool to watch my sons love this classic as much as I did when I was their age.
great movie if you have all the 8 seasons
Great DVD.  Affordable and well worth the money.  My son really enjoyed the new Voltron on Netflix and it was nice to be able to show him the Voltron I grew up on.
My son cannot watch this enough - perfect video if you want to 'test it out' to see if your kids like Voltron before buying the box sets
Seller shipped item quickly and was packaged well.  Great memories of Voltron from when I was a kid.  If you enjoyed Voltron when you were younger, check this movie out.
Good seller. Product great, as described. Good ship time
